column5: Hi there, for the ProMag, does anyone know what type of plug I will need for the Terrova to properly fit the boat's receptacle?  Thanks in advance.
Better to change the boat's receptacle than the motor's plug.
Yep match the receptacle to the Terrova plug
Is it a new unit? If it is, then it doesn't come equipped with a plug out of the box...
New unit and boat comes with a receptacle which is why I want to match the plug to it (dealer is installing a unit I bought from a local store for free so want to provide all the right hardware).
